metadata.name: Show Me Your Mardi Gras #1
metadata.description: Experience the magic of Mardi Gras like never before with the unique NFT collection created by the founding members of the Nieux Society in collaboration with an AI engine. These NFTs bring to life the 504 Founders' vision of their own version of the iconic celebration, featuring elaborate floats, glittering costumes, and all the energy and excitement of Mardi Gras. But this is more than just an incredible party â€” each NFT serves as your web3 powered Mardi Gras passport and grants you access to the creativity and innovation of the New Orleans web3 community from Twelfth night to Mardi Gras Day each year. The Nieux Society will be your host, and The Nieux on St. Charles Avenue will be your home base. Don't miss this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to fully immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of New Orleans.
